mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Category(CategoryID,GrpID, CategoryName, cnt, Rdate) VALUES(category_seq.nextval, #{GrpID}, #{CategoryName}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT CategoryID, GrpID, CategoryName, Visible, Seqno, cnt, Rdate FROM Category ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT CategoryID, GrpID, CategoryName, Visible, Seqno, cnt, Rdate FROM Category WHERE visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT CategoryID, GrpID, CategoryName, cnt, Rdate FROM Category WHERE CategoryID = #{CategoryID}
mapper.update: UPDATE Category SET GrpID = #{GrpID}, CategoryName = #{CategoryName}, cnt = #{cnt} WHERE CategoryID = #{CategoryID}
UPDATE Category SET Seqno = Seqno - 1 WHERE CategoryID=#{CategoryID}
UPDATE Category SET Seqno = Seqno + 1 WHERE CategoryID=#{CategoryID}
UPDATE Category SET Visible='Y' WHERE CategoryID=#{CategoryID}
UPDATE Category SET Visible='N' WHERE CategoryID=#{CategoryID}
